entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
